name: The Cave T-Cross
description:
You are standing in a mudlike substance.  The smell here is awful, it is
rotten.  To the west you can see some light.

exits.description: To the east the tunnel still goes downwards.
You can see some light to the west.

extra_descriptions.description: When you examine the mud, you notice small worms crawling around.
The worms are purple.  They do not look edible.
